Title: Asynchronous generation of the Copilot activity report CSV
EnhancedContent: The Copilot activity report download process is now asynchronous. When an admin requests the report, it is generated in the background, and the user receives an email with a link to download the CSV once it is ready. This change improves reliability and scalability, particularly for large organizations.
Author: Allison
Description:
